hero_description: Discover our offer of tools that will make your industrial ventures even more effective and efficient!
section_description_1: Comprehensive supply of enterprises in the field of various types of industrial tools, specialized equipment and OHS products.
section_2_background_alt: Examples of reprinting photos offered tools

0.title: Hand tools: hammers, screwdrivers, saws, pliers, etc.

1.title: Electric tools: drills, grinders, screwdrivers, etc.

2.title: Pneumatic tools: pneumatic hammers, pneumatic keys, etc.

3.title: Hydraulic tools: hydraulic lifts, hydraulic presses, etc.

4.title: Measuring tools: caliper, micrometers, lines, etc.

5.title: Welding tools: welding machines, burners, electrodes, etc.

6.title: Cutting tools: Tokar knives, cutters, drills, etc.

7.title: Abrasive tools: shields, brushes, whetstone etc.

8.title: Industrial works: manipulators, automation, production lines, etc.

9.title: 3D printers: stereolitographic printers, FDM printers, SLS printers, filaments, etc.

section_description_3: Services in the selection of appropriate tools depending on:
simple_li_2: the material that you work out,
